feature.label: ECF OSGi 4.2 Remote Services Admin
feature.description: This feature provides the ECF Implementation of OSGi 4.2 Remote Services. Remote Services are specified in chapter 13 of the OSGi compendium specification. See http://www.osgi.org/download/r4v42/r4.cmpn.pdf.
